website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty dock line meant for a variety of uses on the water and around the dock.
pros: Heavy braided design offers good durability for forces up to 2,200 pounds
Meant for fresh or salt water use
cons: Line comes without a float, allowing them to sink if not properly secured

customer_reviews.title: I used these as cross ties for my horses
customer_reviews.text: So I was having horrible luck with horse cross ties bought these for it because they could break everything else. I highly recommend anyone looking for great cross ties that your horses can't break. They poles will break before these do. I can say enough about how much these have been a huge benefit for vetting and farrier work. I know that they are meant to be used for a boat.But sometimes you just got to take a blind leap of faith and I am excited that I did rescue horses can be very difficult and dangerous at first but with these it took a lot of the danger away when getting their health up to where it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Boats!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the dock lines we purchased from your company. They are not used in the way they were intended, however they are great! I needed durable, long, strong line or rope for our 2 Great Danes we take out on our boat! They work great and I am very satisfied with the quality, price and the overall product!
customer_reviews.author: catherine613

customer_reviews.title: Mooring Lines
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect dock lines for tying up our boat! We just bought a pontoon boat and needed some mooring lines to secure the boat in its slip. I wanted a line that had a caribiner on one end and a tied loop on the other. These were just what I needed! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bmcgahern

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: One of the ropes arrived defective. I wish there was a way to contact seller to replace just the one rope. It’s such a waste of resources to mail back both back if only one is defective. Please see photo. The other rope is sturdy and both have great clasps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Someone said they're made for a jet skis but hold my 20 foot pontoon boat
customer_reviews.text: Top nylon rope that holds my 20 foot pontoon boat to my floating dock great
customer_reviews.author: timothy Eddolls

customer_reviews.title: It does the job its supposed to and it was a good
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. It's a tow rope. I cant get too excited about writing this review. It does the job its supposed to and it was a good price
customer_reviews.author: hh

customer_reviews.title: Multi Use Sturdy Lines
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to keep in the kayaks in case needed to tow or tie up but we used them so far to tow a kid on a float behind a kayak and as a tie out for a dog. We were planning to use them to tether our floats to the shore but haven't done that yet. Sturdy and strong, I can imagine a lot of uses for camping, floating, boating, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JiminyC

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Short but get the job done for PWC ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Short but get the job done for PWC quick tying and small enough to just tie around the sea doo spark handles behind the seat for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Thicker then expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how flimsy the ropes we were using were until I received these. The rope is thick with a nice loop on one end. The hook is extremely easy to open unlike the plastic ones we had. I like the indent in the hook so you know it is secure and will not pull open. This is one of those things I didn't know I needed until I got one. In my opinion, well worth the extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: P. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Really like the quality of this dock line and it will ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like the quality of this dock line and it will be a nice addition to helping me dock my new Yamaha Waverunner. Very high quality product on first blush!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice ropes, great clips, just wish the rope was more of a softer fabric material vs the plastic material, LOVE that they are green and easy to spot!
customer_reviews.author: K & B

customer_reviews.title: Ask gear Premium PWC dock lines
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely happy with the PWC dock ropes I received from your company. They were exactly what I was expecting to receive and worked perfect each time I've used them. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for tying up jet ski to the boat
customer_reviews.text: Great product, used it multiple times so far this season. Its a breeze having the loop to go on the cleat on the boat, or a dock. The hook is super simple to attach to the jet ski / personal watercraft. Great product feels very strong and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and essential
customer_reviews.text: I clip this to one end of my Hobie Mirage Revolution 13 kayak to pull along side our dock on Our Bay of the Gulf. The dock line is on the side handle and I needed something to clip on and off when coming in to lift onto the dock. Excellent product. Fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Dobe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Line snapped and snap shackles broke.
customer_reviews.text: The dock lines are more like ski ropes. The clips are not heavy duty. 2 of 4 broke. Line snapped after 2 months of use. Dock lines do not tie to the cleat without unraveling. They are great for very light use such as fueling. Otherwise, dont rely on them. Using them to tie a yamaha VXR jetski.
customer_reviews.author: Nixinator

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the design of these but they started to visibly fray after only one use.
customer_reviews.author: James Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very strong rope. Two sizes are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dock lines. I use them when I beach my jon boat and they work perfect. Good quality rope as well. Clips hook into the cleats at the docks as well. Easier than tying off! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sean patrick mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Clasped Hooks
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these dock lines is great. The quality is awesome and the clasped hooks make tying up at the dock super quick and easy. We use one to hook up to the front of our seadoo with our mooring whips. We just need to unclip and go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 18 ft Power boat! Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for our 18 ft power boat. Defiantly recommend this product. Comes with a convenient looped end on both and the clips nicely to the boat cleats for docking and maneuvering onto the trailer. Also very bright I color and floats on the water.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a kayak, love the attention getting color.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great dock lines to use with my PWC. I have nothing poor to say about the lines.....good quality. What I would LOVE to find are dock lines that adjust in length that have the loop at one end and the metal clip at the other end. If someone can produce that, I believe they would have a good selling product as I've heard others say the same thing.

Looks great out of the package and the rope itself is solid but the clips are garbage. Ordered two and the first one broke within an hour of use securing a waverunner. The 2nd one broke by the end of the day. Will be returning both. You get what you pay for. Spend extra money for quality clips.

product_meta.title: Skog Å Kust Premium Dock Lines for PWC, Kayaks & Boats
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY: These 12mm thick (1/2") braided quick cleat lines are rated for up to 2200 lbs (1000kg), perfect for kayaks, SUPs, or lightweight personal watercraft..

SALTWATER AND FRESHWATER USE: Built to be used in either freshwater or marine environments our dock lines feature a rust proof 316 stainless steel snap clip on one end, and custom spliced 10" long loop on the other.
HIGH VISIBILITY: Our dock lines utilize custom high visibility yellow and green colors. This allows them to stand out and be easily visible and accessible, even at night!

2 PACK: Package includes both a 7ft and 14ft dock line for convenience in a variety of situations. Each dock line is also packaged with reusable velcro cinch wrap which makes for easy storage when not in use.
SHOP RISK FREE: We're so sure you'll love these dock lines, they come with our satisfaction guarantee and lifetime warranty for manufacturing defects.
